short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Sasquash is a fun and engaging game right on Chrome, with simple gameplay and quick access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Sasquash is a fun and engaging game right on Chrome, with simple gameplay and quick access. By selecting the level, the first will be level 1, your job is to click on the wooden blocks to make Sasquash fall to the floor as the last rock. The following levels will be more difficult when Sasquash moves askew, your job is to destroy the wooden block so that Sasquash does not deviate from the foundation stone to win.
